title: Split a String in Balanced Strings
content:
Balanced strings are those who have an equal quantity of 'L' and 'R' characters.
Given a balanced string s split it in the maximum amount of balanced strings.

title: Remove Palindromic Subsequences Question with Solution.
content:
Given a string s consisting only of letters 'a' and 'b'. In a single step, you can remove one palindromic subsequence from s.
Return the minimum number of steps to make the given string empty.

title: Generate a String With Characters That Have Odd Counts
Find the Destination City
content:
You are given the array paths, where paths[i] = [cityAi, cityBi] means there exists a direct path going from cityAi to cityBi. Return the destination city, that is, the city without any path outgoing to another city.

title: String Matching in an Array
Reformat The String
content:

title: Maximum Score After Splitting a String
content:
Given a string s of zeros and ones, return the maximum score after splitting the string into two non-empty substrings (i.e. left substring and right substring).
The score after splitting a string is the number of zeros in the left substring plus the number of ones in the right substring.<

title: Find a single occurring element in an array where each element occurred twice.
Two sum problem ( With Repeating Numbers )
content:
Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.
